verses.verse: Now <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up and <S%H2583>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%>; and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of Jabesh <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5176>Nahash,<s%> <S%H3772>"Make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us and we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> you."

But <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I will <S%H3772>make<s%> [it] with you on <S%H2088>this<s%> condition, that I will <S%H5365>gouge<s%> out the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> of you, thus I will <S%H7760>make<s%> it a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7503>"Let<s%> us <S%H7503>alone<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that we may <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Then, <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H3467>deliver<s%> us, we will <S%H3318>come<s%> out to you."

Then the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voices<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> from the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H1241>oxen;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is [the matter] with the <S%H5971>people<s%> that they <S%H1058>weep<s%>?" So they <S%H5608>related<s%> to him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh.<s%>

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9484>came<s%> upon <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H9484>mightily<s%> when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> and he <S%H2734>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H639>angry.<s%> <S%H2734><s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H5408>cut<s%> them in <S%H5408>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> [them] <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H834>"Whoever<s%> does not <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to his <S%H1241>oxen.<s%>" Then the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H3318>came<s%> out as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
And he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in <S%H966>Bezek;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were 300000, and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> 30000.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> who had <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%>, <S%H4279>'Tomorrow,<s%> by the time the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H2552>hot,<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance.<s%>'" So the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of Jabesh; and they were <S%H8055>glad.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow<s%> we will <S%H3318>come<s%> out to you, and you may <S%H6213>do<s%> to us <S%H3605>whatever<s%> seems <S%H2896>good<s%> to you."

And it <S%H1961>happened<s%> the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>morning<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> the <S%H5983>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of the <S%H3117>day.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that those who <S%H7604>survived<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> so that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of them were <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> is he that <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Shall <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us?' <S%H5414>Bring<s%> the <S%H376>men,<s%> that we may <S%H4191>put<s%> them to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"

But <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Not a <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> for <S%H3117>today<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>accomplished<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> and let us <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> and <S%H2318>renew<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>"

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> they also <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>
